summary: This document consists of email correspondence regarding the purchase of a property located at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH. The emails discuss title examination, due diligence, and the urgency of completing the transaction before the Thanksgiving holiday. The communication highlights the importance of verifying wire instructions to prevent fraud.

persons.name: Steve Marshal
persons.context: Steve Marshal is involved in the purchase of the property and is communicating with attorneys regarding the title and due diligence.

persons.name: Attorney IIMM
persons.context: Attorney IIMM is mentioned as handling the title due diligence for the property purchase.

connections.description: Steve Marshal is seeking legal assistance from Attorney IIMM for the title examination and due diligence related to his property purchase.
Steve Marshal is in contact with El, a real estate agent from Sotheby's, regarding the property purchase.

events.title: Effective Date of Purchase Agreement
events.description: The effective date of the Purchase and Sale agreement for the property is noted.

events.title: Deadline for Title Due Diligence
events.description: The deadline for completing satisfactory title due diligence is set for November 30th.

keyFacts: Steve Marshal is in the process of purchasing a property at 338 East Washington Road, Bradford, NH.
Attorney IIMM is responsible for conducting the title due diligence for the property.
There is a warning about potential fraud related to wire transfers in the correspondence.
The effective date of the Purchase and Sale agreement is November 20, 2019.
The deadline for title due diligence is set for November 30, 2019.
